revisions.*: Because "rvslots" was not specified, a legacy format has been used for the output. This format is deprecated, and in the future the new format will always be used.

[[Category:Items]]
[[File:Bank_Storage_Increase_Deed_Preview.PNG|thumb|This is a special deed that will increase the number of items that your bank can hold.]]

__TOC__
=Description=
This is a special deed that can be used on a player in order to increase the [[Bank]] space. This will increase the current [[Bank]] space by 15 items up to a maximum of 300 item count in a single players [[Bank]]. 

==Patch Notes==
* [https://www.uoforum.com/threads/new-quality-of-life-items.110193/ new-quality-of-life-items.110193]

=Using the Deed=
The Bank Storage Increase Deed needs to be used from within your bag, and will tell you what your maximum item count has been increased to upon use:

[[File:Bank_Storage_Increase_Deed_First_Use.PNG|The First use of a Bank Storage Increase Deed. The deed must be used from your backpack and will increase the maximum item count of your characters bank by 15.]]

When you can no longer benefit from using a Bank Storage Increase Deed, which is around 290 maximum item count, you will receive a message stating such:

[[File:Bank_Storage_Increase_Deed_Last_Use.PNG|When you can no longer benefit from using a Bank Storage Increase Deed, you will receive a message stating that the deed will have no effect. You cannot go above 300 maximum items in your bank so you will receive this message at 290 items.]]

=Located=
The Bank Storage Increase Deed is purchasable with [[Donation_Coin|1000 Donation Coins]] from [[Exotic_Item_Vendor|Nadine the Exotic Item Donation Vendor]] located in front of the [[Britain|West Britain Bank]].

[[File:Bank_Storage_Increase_Deed_Location.PNG|The Bank Storage Increase Deed will increase your banks storage's item count by 15 up to a maximum of 300 items.]]
